metadata.title: Extra Large Pill Organizer - Pill Box 7 Day Weekly Pill Organizer 2 Times a Day and AM PM Daily Pill Organizer Case for Medication Pills and Supplements with Braille and Bright XL Easy to Read Colors
features: BRIGHT. BOLD. EASY TO READ: Our Extra Large 2 times a day weekly pill organizer was designed so that anyone can easily read the bright and colorful markings either during the day or night. Meaning this pill box 7 day weekly organizer is great for those who have been impacted by vision loss, macular degeneration, and other impairment

EXTRA LARGE: With this extra large pill sorter you will no longer have to fight for room to get all your medications and supplements into one compartment. This pill caddy organizer easily fits up to 10 fish oil pills and up to 15 larger size vitamins in each compartment. The translucent lids keeps the contents visible and helps to prevent missing a dose

UPGRADED LABELS: The colors make it even simpler to organize and each day label is screen printed with high quality upgraded ink. That means you no longer have to worry about the "days of the week" rubbing-off or getting scratched when you use this twice a day pill organizer

BPA FREE! SAFE + ULTRA DURABLE: Our day night pill organizer is made from an extra durable plastic which means that your medication is kept safe and secure. It won’t break easily and each lid will stay securely closed. Our product is BPA FREE and NON-TOXIC. That means your medications is safe in this weekly pill organizer and away from harmful leeching and contaminants

TRUSTED BRAND! 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED: If you've been looking for reliable pill containers 7 day am pm that will help easily manage all of your vitamins, fish oil, and prescription pills efficiently, then your search is over! At MEDca you will always be confident that your satisfaction is always our #1 priority and that we'll do everything in our power to make sure you have an excellent customer experience with us
description: The MEDca Bold Face AM/PM Weekly Pill Organizer is Perfect for Scheduling Your Weekly Medication

Our Extra Large 2 times a day weekly pill organizer was designed so that anyone can easily read the bright and colorful markings either during the day or night. Meaning this pill box 7 day weekly organizer is great for those who have been impacted by vision loss, macular degeneration, and other impairment.

With this extra large 7 day pill sorter you will no longer have to fight for room to get all your medications and supplements into one compartment. This pill caddy organizer easily fits up to 10 fish oil pills and up to 15 larger size vitamins in each compartment. The translucent lids keeps the contents visible and helps to prevent missing a dose. Made from an extra durable plastic which means that your medication is kept safe and secure. It won’t break easily and each lid will stay securely closed. Our product is BPA FREE and NON-TOXIC. That means your medications is safe in this day and night pill organizer and away from harmful leeching and contaminants.
